chunks.zh: 当听到苹果店员说，用手机壳会影响电池寿命
chunks.en: When I heard the Apple store staff say that using a phone case affects battery life

chunks.zh:
闲来无事经过直营店的时候刚好 10 点开门，里面没人，迎面而来的店员想跟我寒暄，我就吐槽说刚更新系统，250 次循环的电池从 100 到 99 再到今天 98 ，整个循环周期增加不超过 10 次。

店员说，哎呀和更新系统无关，根据我们观察，使用手机壳会减少电池寿命。
chunks.en:
I happened to pass by a direct store when it opened at 10 o'clock, and there was no one inside. The staff who came up to me wanted to greet me, and I complained that I had just updated the system and the battery with 250 cycles had dropped from 100 to 99 and then to 98 today, with the entire cycle count increasing by no more than 10 times.

The staff said, oh, it has nothing to do with updating the system. According to our observation, using a phone case will reduce battery life.

chunks.zh: 我反问，因为堆积热量？
chunks.en: I asked back, because of accumulated heat?

chunks.zh:
店员说是啊是啊。

我回复要是不用手机壳，估计电池寿命还在，手机寿命就给我摔没了。

然后就听到说，所以我们建议购买 ac 啊。

感觉这话术已经培训多年。
chunks.en:
The staff said yes, yes.

I replied that if I didn't use a phone case, the battery life would probably still be there, but the phone life would be gone because I would have dropped it.

Then I heard them say, so we recommend buying AC.

I feel like this sales pitch has been trained for many years.

chunks.zh: 之前别人吐槽更新系统给降低电池健康度我还不信，5 天之内这个降低法我还真信了。
chunks.en: Before, I didn't believe others' complaints that updating the system reduced battery health, but after seeing this decrease within 5 days, I really believe it.

chunks.zh: @cassidy0134 那你就错了，苹果评估 specialist 的指标之一，不是卖了多少设备，而是 ac 销售率。
chunks.en: @cassidy0134 Then you are wrong. One of the metrics Apple uses to evaluate specialists is not how many devices they sell, but the AC sales rate.

chunks.zh: @cassidy0134 #1 楼主是说带壳缩短电池寿命，「不带壳正常」并不能佐证楼主的观点，也不能反驳楼主的观点，所以你说了一句废话。
chunks.en: @cassidy0134 #1 The original poster is saying that using a case shortens battery life. 'Normal without a case' cannot prove the original poster's point, nor can it refute it, so you said something useless.

chunks.zh: 用手机壳影响电池寿命，不用手机壳会影响手机寿命，两害相权取其轻。
chunks.en: Using a phone case affects battery life, and not using a phone case affects phone life. Choose the lesser of two evils.

chunks.zh: @kodise 是的，KPI 的核心指标。很多店员都受不了推销这个不想干了。
chunks.en: @kodise Yes, it's a core KPI. Many employees can't stand pushing this and don't want to do it anymore.

chunks.zh: 是的 之前去 genius bar 说过了 边充边玩是对电池最好的 但是提前是没发热，发热才是电池杀手，之前的磁吸充电宝就是电子垃圾
chunks.en: Yes, I went to the Genius Bar before and they said that playing while charging is best for the battery, but only if it doesn't generate heat. Heat is the killer of batteries. The previous magnetic power bank was just electronic garbage.

chunks.zh: @alading11 #27 不一定所有产品都是零和博弈，举个例子人寿保险你和保险公司都能从中获利。
chunks.en: @alading11 #27 Not all products are zero-sum games. For example, with life insurance, both you and the insurance company can benefit.

chunks.zh: 纯属搞笑。水果店自己都卖壳，等会你掏出一个官壳来他又如何应对
chunks.en: Purely ridiculous. The Apple store itself sells cases. What will they do if you pull out an official case?

chunks.zh: @cassidy0134 #1 “没看出来什么必然联系”，不就是在反驳别人观点吗... 说错了就错了，没什么大不了的，不要急。
chunks.en: @cassidy0134 #1 'Didn't see any necessary connection' Isn't that refuting someone else's point? If you said something wrong, you said something wrong. It's not a big deal, don't be anxious.

chunks.zh: ta 帮你提出解决方案，你觉得 ta 在推销，但实际上，苹果没有必要向你推荐 ac ，因为这样更赚
chunks.en: They are offering you a solution, and you feel like they are selling something, but in reality, Apple doesn't need to recommend AC to you, because they earn more that way.

chunks.zh: @Takizawa  @halida 懂了 马上设计一个只捂着电池不保护手机的壳子（只有背板）
chunks.en: @Takizawa @halida Got it. I'll design a case right away that only covers the battery and doesn't protect the phone (only a back panel)

chunks.zh: @whileFalse Tim 不雇佣你做 Associate CEO 真对不起 Steve ！
chunks.en: @whileFalse Tim not hiring you as Associate CEO is a real disservice to Steve!

chunks.zh: 他说的对，实际上温度是影响电池寿命最重要因素，你带手机壳，散热不好的话，玩手机时候温度就高，电池受到损耗就大。
chunks.en: He's right, in fact temperature is the most important factor affecting battery life. If you use a phone case and the heat dissipation is not good, the temperature will be high when you play on your phone, and the battery will be greatly worn down.

chunks.zh: 这里澄清一个误区，大家认为充电玩手机有害手机电池寿命，不是因为边充边放电，而且因为冲电玩手机手机温度上升的很快导致发热严重，手机电池寿命下降。
chunks.en: Here's a clarification of a misconception: people think that playing on the phone while charging is harmful to the phone's battery life, not because of charging and discharging at the same time, but because the phone's temperature rises quickly when playing on the phone while charging, causing serious heat, which reduces the phone's battery life.

chunks.zh: 其实不仅用手机壳会影响电池寿命，用手机也会影响电池寿命。==》 买了手机就是用的，寿命到了就换新手机就是了，别把精力花在这上面，意义不大
chunks.en: In fact, not only using a phone case will affect battery life, but using a phone will also affect battery life. ==》 You bought a phone to use it. When it reaches the end of its life, just replace it with a new one. Don't spend your energy on this, it's not very meaningful.

chunks.zh: 没看出来什么必然联系，我从不戴壳，电池寿命也正常，也没有摔过
chunks.en: I don't see any necessary connection. I never use a case, and my battery life is normal, and I haven't dropped it either.

chunks.zh: 买只有边框的手机壳就好了呀。多简单。
chunks.en: Just buy a phone case with only the frame. How simple.

chunks.zh: @Takizawa #3 我正想这么说😄
chunks.en: @Takizawa #3 I was just thinking of saying that 😄

chunks.zh: 问题是修过的电子设备我是没兴趣继续用的……一年正常保内就坏的产品不会再买所以现在我已经不再购买任何 AC 了
chunks.en: The problem is that I'm not interested in continuing to use repaired electronic devices... I won't buy products that break down within a year under normal warranty, so I no longer buy any AC.

chunks.zh: 就 iPhone 那个无线充电的发热量，MagSafe 岂不是电池杀手？
chunks.en: With the heat generated by iPhone's wireless charging, isn't MagSafe a battery killer?

chunks.zh: 无线充电本来就是电池杀手。
chunks.en: Wireless charging is inherently a battery killer.

chunks.zh: @ACSOUV 买 AC 都是冲着保意外的啊，一年内正常使用坏掉的概率太低了，摔地上碎屏的倒是不少。
chunks.en: @ACSOUV Buying AC is all about insuring against accidents. The probability of it breaking down under normal use within a year is too low, but there are many cases of cracked screens from falling on the ground.
